snippet: Responses to a news article from Richard M. Daley, a former mayor of Chicago, Karen Freeman-Wilson, the mayor of Gary, Ind., and the Baltimore Community Foundation.
lead_paragraph: Responses to a news article from Richard M. Daley, a former mayor of Chicago, Karen Freeman-Wilson, the mayor of Gary, Ind., and the Baltimore Community Foundation.

headline.main: Helping Our Troubled Cities Rebuild and Grow
